name: The Escape (itch) (ScoutTheWoz)
description:
You wake up.  You see a room with a floating artifact and you get the ability to copy yourself to make platforms.  Use it to escape the cave, a place full of traps, almost as if to trap someone.

------------------------------------------

This was a game that I made in less than a day.  There may be many bugs and it may be very short but I am willing to expand upon it in the future.  Made with Godot.
